message: Let's make this fair and efficient. I'm offering you a generous $450000 while I take $550000. If you decline, the money will be worth less for me in the next round due to inflation, making us both worse off.

Since your money is worth 20% less this round, this 400k offer is actually worth 320k to you. If you reject, it will be worth even less next round. This is your best option now - I suggest you accept.
